byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and Michael Winerip contributed reporting.

abstract: Captain Medzid Kolenovic and Correction Officer Jean Destine are charged with beating Rikers Island inmate, 18-year-old Ambiorix Celedonio, out of view of security cameras and filing paper work to cover up their actions; assault resulted in Celedonio's hospitalization.
lead_paragraph: The two pleaded not guilty Friday to assaulting the inmate, Ambiorix Celedonio, who prosecutors said was attacked in a closet, away from video surveillance cameras.

headline.main: Rikers Island Captain and Officer Are Charged With Beating Inmate, 18
headline.print_headline: Rikers Officer and Captain Are Charged in a Beating

snippet: The two pleaded not guilty Friday to assaulting the inmate, Ambiorix Celedonio, who prosecutors said was attacked in a closet, away from video surveillance cameras.
